org.apache.kafka.streams.processor

Class WallclockTimestampExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.streams.processor.WallclockTimestampExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimestampExtractor

    public class WallclockTimestampExtractor
extends Object
implements TimestampExtractor
    Retrieves current wall clock timestamps as System.currentTimeMillis(). Using this extractor effectively provides processing-time semantics. If you need event-time semantics, use ConsumerRecordTimestampExtractor with built-in CreateTime or LogAppendTime timestamp (see KIP-32: Add timestamps to Kafka message for details).
